Jay Laiche

Hi, I'm Jay Laiche.

And I'm a Web Developer & Designer.

Specializing In:

HTML - CSS/SASS - JS/JQUERY - WORDPRESS - PHP - MYSQL - UNIX - PHOTOSHOP/ILLUSTRATOR - USER EXPERIENCE - INTERACTION DESIGN

I'm a soon to be graduate of Virginia Tech, from which I will leave and work as a Wordpress developer in Richmond, Virginia. I also dabble in graphic design and web/mobile app development. When I'm not glued to a computer screen, I like to rock climb, find new music to listen to, snowboard if the seasons allow, and when I can, travel.

The following site is a portfolio of my academic work throughout my years at Virginia Tech.
